articles.title: Duncan Keith retires after 17 NHL seasons with Chicago Blackhawks, Edmonton Oilers
articles.description: Two-time Norris Trophy winner Duncan Keith, who skated 16 seasons with the Blackhawks before one final season with the Oilers, has retired from the NHL. He won three titles with Chicago, including being awarded the Conn Smythe Trophy in 2015.
articles.content: Edmonton Oilers defenseman Duncan Keith announced his retirement Tuesday after 17 NHL seasons, during which he twice won the Norris Trophy and the Stanley Cup three times with the Chicago Blackhawks.… [+1870 chars]

articles.title: Retired Tampa Bay Buccaneers TE Rob Gronkowski says he's not planning a return
articles.description: Former NFL tight end Rob Gronkowski says he plans to stay retired this time around. The future Hall of Famer retired from the Patriots in 2018, before returning to the field with the Buccaneers in 2020.
articles.content:
BOSTON -- Tampa Bay Buccaneers tight end Rob Gronkowski said Tuesday that his retirement is final, and he is now focused on business ventures with his family.

articles.title: Barcelona's Alexia Putellas faces 10-12 months on sidelines after knee surgery
articles.description: Barcelona's Alexia Putellas will miss the 2022-23 season and faces a race against time to be fit for the World Cup after undergoing knee surgery.
articles.content:
Barcelona midfielder Alexia Putellas will miss the 2022-23 season and faces a race against time to be fit for next summer's World Cup after undergoing knee surgery on Tuesday.
